title: An Interview with Pat Vines

abstract: I didn't think too much about war in the beginning but a lot of girls my age were joining the services.
description: Pat Vines joined the Australian Navy as a nurse during World War II. She moved up the ranks and eventually became a Commander. Pat tells her story through her memories of wartime and what it was like to work in the Navy.
